bike.description: Step-thru Specialized A1 Premium Aluminium frame w/ smooth welding, fender and rack braze-ons, forged drop outs and kickstand mount

components.description: SR SunTour SF11-NVX-700C, alloy lower, 28mm stanchions, coil spring
Ahead, loose ball, Cr-Mo cups, 25.5mm stack
Hi-Ten riser bar, 25.4mm, 32mm rise, 640mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 6 degree up
Shimano FD-TX51, 31.8mm clamp, top swing, dual pull
SR SunTour Square taper spline, replaceable outer ring, w/ chainguard
Cartridge bearing, square spindle with crank stop right side and capless bolts
Composite plastic body, loose ball w/ reflectors
Double sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 17mm contact side, 5mm QR
Double sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 19mm contact side, 5mm QR
Specialized Borough XC Sport, 700x45c, 60TPI, wire bead
Specialized Borough XC Sport, 700x45c, 60TPI, wire bead
Body Geometry Women's Riva MTB, 155mm width
Chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
